amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used for television broadcasting to Cuba.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 284 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 35. Record Vote Number: 85.
Amendment SA 284 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S3191-3192; text: CR S3191) To prohibit funds from being used for television broadcasting to Cuba.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 284 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 35. Record Vote Number: 85.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 284 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
